narrative.narrative: Semeyavia was a domestic Kazakhstan airline based at Semey in the northeast of Kazakhstan near the Russian border. It operated from around 1991 until July 2013. Its only scheduled route was to the countrys largest city of Almaty which is on the otherside of the country in the extreme south near the Kyrgyzstan border, an 815km/506mi flight. It had two Yak 40's most of its life and from December 2010 to the end had an Embraer 145 to renew its fleet.
